Closed issue "Router-link via <component> lost href after first change path." (#2005) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://codesandbox.io/s/qz0m332p8w](https://codesandbox.io/s/qz0m332p8w)

### Steps to reproduce
Generate router-link from array by v-for using `<component>`
Click on router-link.
![vokoscreen-2018-01-15_17-45-03](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11390039/34947672-def17f2e-fa1b-11e7-89a4-8f8a0cafaf63.gif)

### What is expected?
Not lost href attribute

### What is actually happening?
href attribute disapper
